lovecrafts please don t hesitate to contact me lunacollie@gmail com or via ravelry or etsy if you have any problem following the pattern or notice a mistake or just to show me your creation 7 eyelash yarn tips the first and most important thing don t worry too much if you can hardly find the stitches while you are crocheting absolutely nobody will see mistakes on the finished piece choose a thin core eyelash yarn with fine feathers they are easier to work with and look more like hedgehog spikes than the type that has thick feathers fig a if possible avoid black or very dark colors they make it harder to see where the stitches are use a bigger hook than for plain yarns i suggest 5mm/size h while amigurumi in general should be worked tightly to avoid gaps the fuzz will create enough coverage here so you can keep your gauge looser than usual more like how you would crochet clothing when working with eyelash yarn always crochet your stitches in the back loop only this both makes the work easier and creates a looser fabric that lets the eyelash yarn look its best if you can t see the stitches try smoothing the lashes towards the already existing fabric this usually exposes the core of the yarn fig b if you still can t find the stitch just insert the hook where you think it should be if you accidentally add or lose some stitches no problem remember no one is going to know the wrong side of the piece the side facing away from you while you crochet is much fuzzier so that should become the outside in the end free trapped lashes with a bristle brush or by raking through the fur fabric with a yarn needle spine coat use eyelash yarn with a 5mm/h hook and work all your stitches in back loops only with all the fluff it might be hard to see if you ve actually inserted your hook into the back or the front loop but that is no big deal just make sure you work into one loop rather than both - and it is something you will be able to feel even when not seeing anything because either blo or flo feels much more loose than inserting your hook into both loops round 1 with eyelash yarn make a slip knot chain 2 work 6 single_crochet in the 2nd chain from hook mark the 1st and 4th stitches 6 fig 13 from here on continue without counting remember to work in blo remove marker work 3 single_crochet in the stitch and put the marker in the middle single_crochet single_crochet in each st until you reach to the next marked stitch fig 14-15
